title: OCE Twisted Treeline Ranked 4/10 Bronze V?
body: I finished my first ever twisted treeline ranked provisionals and I won 4/10 of my games. I'm currently Silver III on summoners rift ranked solo/duo and was Gold V last season so I expected maybe Silver V or Bronze I. But after all 10 games I got placed in Bronze V? I don't understand at all. Someone please explain why I got such a low rank?

replies.body:
Ranks are relative, as far as your mmr for ranked TT is concerned you are in the bottom 10% of the ladder in terms of performance.

Your ranked flex/ranked solo mmr and rank have nothing to do with your  ranked TT mmr and rank.


TLDR: Ranks don't have any affect between different queues, only your performance affects this.

This is correct, you're basically start from the beginning in a new queue like this.  It's also worth keeping in mind that in general, losses/wins aren't always equivalent. If you were playing players who had a lower rating during your provisionals and lost, you might have lost more MMR than you gained from your wins, which could drop you further than you'd expect.

why do i never can play 3v3 its always aram or nexus siege I only can played  yesterday otherwise each time its not available. Is that normal ? me i dont want nexus siege or aram. how can i do ? cheers

Twisted Treeline is available on 3pm-1am Tuesday/Wednesday for the normal queue and 3pm-1am Thursday for the Ranked Queue. 

For Nexus Siege, that's the currently active rotating game mode. The active mode changes over time (check the most recent patch notes for details), but otherwise it's available 11am-3am Friday-Monday. ARAM is always available.

[This is the currently active queue schedule that we keep updated](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/5F9Y3rXr-oce-twisted-treeline-ranked-410-bronze-v?comment=000000000001)
how a nice mode can be online 1 day a week... how to get challenger if we can play only that few? are you gonna put it permanent soon i mean?
And also maybe his teammates were boosted bonobos which could drop them even further.

yeah on the rift i went 9-1 in my placements and got bronze 1 which makes sense because i finished last season on silver 5 still a little disappointing you.

considering you were gold 5 than it shouldn't be hard for you to climb out of bronze
